title: Barstool Personalities Get Drafted Into The Military
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 3 Round in the magazine and they are presented by WhistlePig! ROUND 1: THE INTEGRITY DRAFT: Drafting Your Squad for the military, but with BARSTOOL PERSONALITIES ROUND 2: Trump Documents! What's in them and who do they incriminate. Chaps, Kate and Cons go full blown speculation ROUND 3: Saved Rounds! SUPPORT THE SHOW: WhistlePig Whiskey - Get your bottle at https://barstool.link/WPZBT or at a local retailer. Rocky Boots - Go to https://barstool.link/RockyBootsBSS and enter the code ZBT at check out for 25% off your next pair of boots. Cross Country Mortgage - Go to https://barstool.link/crosscountrymortgageBSS so CrossCountry Mortgage can take care of you through the buying process Roman - Go to https://barstool.link/RomanZBT to get 20% off your first order of swipes Birddogs - Go to https://barstool.link/BirddogsBSS and use promo code ZERO for a free Birddogs rope hat


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/ZeroBlog30
